channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipped rubbish, 29th November
item.description:
Rubbish was placed here earlier this week. The person who left it possibly expected it to be taken away when the refuse collection was carried out on Tuesday. It is still there.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sheen Road, Poverest, Greater London

item.category: Fly-tip Medium - Up to medium size van load

item.title: Despite what you say, litter still not picked up, 29th November
item.description:
I’ve reported this four times and Friday received a report saying it had been cleaned up. As you can see from the photos, it’s the exact same rubbish as before. I’m not sure why as it’s obvious/visible for everyone to see. It’s all along the undergrowth

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Southwold Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Spurgeon St, SE1 - fly tipping, 29th November
item.description:

item.title: Fly-tipped mattress outside my house - needs removal, 29th November
item.description:
Someone has fly-tipped a large mattress in front of my house. I currently have renovation work ongoing and a skip in my front garden, and since then people have started leaving rubbish on the pavement outside. Could the council please arrange for the mattress to be removed?

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Charlton Road, Charlton
Report on FixMyStreet
